Articles.Content:
I build a monorail between two of the hills, which have two cities of mine on them.

My Twin-Hills on a new page

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-18T17:37:28Z" title="01/18/2022 05:37  PM" data-short="2 yr">January 18, 2022</time> by Nazalassa**

The Twin hills have been separated.

My Isolated Hill

I peek at the hills.

Twin Peaks.

[@BlackMesaSurvivor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/211288-blackmesasurvivor/), do I still have the other hill?

I think yes.

My untwinned Hill. It's friendly to [@BlackMesaSurvivor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/211288-blackmesasurvivor/)'s one, and vice-versa.

Pin Tweaks

(and ninja'd)

I sling a hammock between my Pin Tweak Twin Peaks and relax on.

My Hills.

I set up another hammock and relax.

Our hills

A Large group of West Germans and East Germans agree to topple down the *Our Hill*.

Democracy Hill.

They all become obssessed with the latest stuff.

Demo Crazy Hill.
Psycho Borderline Hill

They build an industry that makes people melancholy.

**SIGH CO** HILL.

Just note that these things are bad, according to Pol's Laws (see my post above).

I come and destroy the **SIGH CO**. and the Demo Craziness.

Then I go to Frigus (from the mod Ethereal Frigus) and settle on a Hill, and you don't know tha... Wait, are you reading this? Woah. My Hill. Clearly. You don't know anything about it, for sure. Wait, you do ???? S\*it. I'm fired.
Gone Postal Nohill

Getting ready to put in the border fences.

Post Hole Hill.

It gets armed.

Pistol Hill

Anti war protesters marchs to the Pistol hill.

Peace Hill

Firearms traders join them.

Peacetol Hill

They find a way to merchandise the hill and hold yearly meetings to fleece the fans,

Hillcon.

The Guild comes, and everything gets wrong.

The Guild post-hill.

You get directions.

The Guide Post Hill.

Pol Police forces come to the Hills because *you did not follow the Pol Laws* (keep telling it).

The give the Hills to me.

My Hills.

You haven't paid your Pol tax. Your hill is seized in lieu of payment and sold off to me for a dollar.

My Cheap but Cheerful Hill.
Cheap but Cheerful Chernobyl Hill

The Pol Laws say that radiative Hills are forbidden as Hills are holy on Pol. The Pol Police seizes the Hill and give it to me as I pay twice my Pol Tax, and any other Taxes.

My Legal Hill.

Radiation doesn't care about your laws.

Self-legalized Cheap but Cheerful Chernobyl Hill
